Brad Mangold Suns have too much talent to be a play-in team. Not only do they have the talent, but they have experience as well. Nearly everyone on that roster has been in the playoffs and played in big games, but they still look like they are trying to figure it out. It does them no favors that the Warriors and Lakers are getting hot at the right time. They need to try to steal the 6th seed from the Pelicans or hope they get the matchup with the Kings. I really hope they can get it together because I think that when everyone is clicking, they could beat anyone in a 7 game series.
